page.title: 16Health Services-Stamford Br.
page.content: In the surgery in Stamford Bridge there is a pharmacy.There are four doctors in Stamford Bridge.Our dentist in Stamford Bridge is called Mr. Strevens and most people in the village go to him.The health visitor goes to people houses especially the old people.She also goes to families which have just had a new baby and sometimes she visits large families. {Going to the Doctor By Karen Wootton I went to the waiting room.After a few minutes I went in to see the Dr.He put a stethescope on my chest and back,then he told me I had tonsilitis.{Going to the Dentist by { Emma Kneeshaw.}When I went in the nurse was making a blue paste.Mr Strevens fixed a plate,with the paste, firmly to my teeth.Then he said I could go.In 5 weeks I got a new brace.
